description.en:
TWO TWO  provides a unique decentralized protocol and circular token economy for the Extreme Art™ marketplace that breaks down the barriers between the artists and the community. It is the platform for Extreme Artists™ to engage with enthusiasts who appreciate the creativity that gave rise to the finished works of art on display and for the community to be the gallery for these artists.

The TWO TWO vision is to create a platform and products that takes the control of art from the hands of the elite and puts it in the hands of the community, enabling everyone to find the next Banksy and for emerging talented artists to find a global audience. Our innovative combination of real world galleries and NFT galleries empowered by optimised liquidity pools creates a truly unique NFT solution in the industry.
